## Collections.ResultMapConverter.update() method

Updates an existing key in the map - the map is not updated if the key does not exist.

**Signature:**

```typescript
update(key: string, value: unknown): DetailedResult<TV, ResultMapResultDetail>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

key


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The key to update.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

value


</td><td>

unknown


</td><td>

The value to set.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[DetailedResult](./ts-utils.detailedresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;TV, [ResultMapResultDetail](./ts-utils.collections.resultmapresultdetail.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the value and detail 'exists' if the key was found and the value updated, `Failure` an error message and with detail `not-found` if the key was not found, or with detail 'invalid-key' or 'invalid-value' if either is invalid.
